title: Allow2
subtitle: All about Parental Freedom in Swift

documents.title: Getting Started
documents.detailSubtitle: How to easily integrate the Allow2 platform with minimal effort and why it should matter to you.
documents.description: It may not immediately be apparent why including parental controls in your app or device makes sense, but in this tutorial we cover why it leads to a greater number of more loyal users and increased revenue, our underlying philosophy and examples of getting started with the platform.
